meanings.definition: To consume the flesh of one's own species.
meanings.sent1: The tribe resorted to cannibalizing their fallen comrades to survive.
meanings.sent2: The lion was cannibalizing the remains of another lion for food.
meanings.sent3: In the horror movie, the zombies were cannibalizing each other in a gruesome scene.
meanings.sent4: The company was slowly cannibalizing itself due to internal conflicts.
meanings.sent5: The image of cannibalizing is both shocking and haunting.

meanings.definition: To use parts of a machine or system to repair or build another.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic was cannibalizing old cars to fix up a vintage model.
meanings.sent2: The IT technician was cannibalizing old computers to create a new functioning one.
meanings.sent3: The robot in the sci-fi story was cannibalizing other robots for spare parts.
meanings.sent4: The artist was cannibalizing broken instruments to make a unique sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The concept of cannibalizing technology is common in the world of DIY enthusiasts.
